For me, personally and professionally, KSA brought the heart back into medicine. Margrit Mikulis, ND, is the owner of Living Natural Inc., a center for natural healthcare in New Hampshire. She is a graduate of the Kripalu School of Ayurveda, naturopathic doctor, Ayurvedic practitioner, and has served for several years as a clinical faculty member in the Kripalu School of Ayurveda. Margrit is known for her dynamic approach; she incorporates naturopathy, Ayurveda, classical homeopathy, and the European traditions of anthroposophical medicine to support the health needs of families throughout the United States. In 2008, she completed her training with ILADS and has utilized an integrative approach to treating Lyme disease for more than a decade. Learn more about this presenter's work: Resources - [The Ayurveda Movement in the United States: A Conversation with NAMA President Margrit Mikulis](/resources/ayurveda-movement-united-states-conversation-nama-president-margrit-mikulis) We're on the cusp of an amazing opportunity to spread Ayurvedic medicine and help more people work toward optimal health, says Margrit, a graduate of the Kripalu School of Ayurveda.
